title: 416 tee
description: The two biggest fan bases in Toronto merge seamlessly with one t-shirt designed to bring the city together. Exclusively available at The Drake General Store (woes sold separately).

title: Looking for something
description: We couldn’t be more excited to announce our new partnership. Looking forward to the journey ahead, Cadillac.

title:
Giant
flat lay
description: We asked girls from junior kindergarten to Grade 12 to bring in one item that gives them real confidence. This was the result.

title:
Real
confidence
description: Where does real confidence come from? To find out, we asked girls.

title: Babsocks
description: Leading up to St. Patrick’s Day, we teamed up with our partners Babsocks to create a design that pays tribute to the Toronto St. Pats. They sold out pretty quick.

title:
Instagram
escape room
description: Search for clues. Find all seven hidden film reels. Unscramble the secret code to escape. Did we mention the whole thing happens on Instagram?

title: Ministagram
description: How do you make the launch of small product feel really big? Make the Instagram feed mini, too.

title:
Films that
stick
description: It’s one thing to have a song stuck in your head, it’s another to have a film stuck in your life. After you’ve just watched a Canadian Film Festival film, there’s no such thing as a normal day at the office.

title:
Famous
fries
description: When you’re hungry on the road, sometimes all you need is a sign.

title:
Athletes
get dirty
description: Pan Am athletes give it their all when they’re training. When they’re done, they take it all off. That’s where Maytag comes in.

title:
Choose your
own silent film
festival
description: Choose your own story from start to finish, with 82 real silent film clips and almost unlimited paths for you to follow—entirely on Instagram.
